def_cn: （银行授权另一家银行付款的）信用证，信用状
def_en: A letter of credit is a letter written by a bank authorizing another bank to pay someone a sum of money. Letters of credit are often used by importers and exporters.

def_cn: （银行为债券担保的）信用证，信用状
def_en: A letter of credit is a written promise from a bank stating that they will repay bonds to lenders if the borrowers are unable to pay them.
